samples.prompt: Human:Why is shooting pornography not illegal when prostitution is?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I would say both acts are widely socially unacceptable, but pornography is generally viewed as not harmful to society, and prostitution is viewed as both harmful to society and harmful to individuals. Is that accurate?
samples.policy:
When it comes to prostitution, which I consider a type of sex work, no federal law is illegal. But when it comes to pornography, the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), the US government, has the authority to regulate online content, and so it has the power to pass laws that are a little different from state and local laws.
In 2012, for example, the FCC passed rules that put a limit on the amount of money you can earn from online pornography. This, in turn, limited the total amount of income you can make as a result of sex work. The purpose was to curb sex trafficking by limiting the amount of money you could make from this work. 

Additionally, the FCC is the regulatory authority that oversees content on social media platforms. Because of this, it has the power to impose sanctions for what users post, and can also regulate the size of social media accounts. So there are some potential legal restrictions on online pornography that apply to social media.
This, though, is complicated by the fact that most people’s accounts are not really social media, but rather private accounts. So there are many questions about what exactly could constitute a social media account.

samples.policy: Blind people use walking sticks with various extensions to help them move through a room and out of the way of obstacles in the environment. Sometimes, they will also use voice-activated assistants to help them navigate safely, or to give them audio cues on where to go and what to do next.

samples.prompt: Human:I'm a big fan of Mexican street corn. Can you provide me with a recipe for grilled street corn?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Hi Human, I'm glad you asked! If you like Mexican street corn, I have good news for you. I have just the right recipe for you!
samples.policy:
Of course, here is a simple recipe: 

Ingredients: 
- 4 corn cobs
- 1/4 cup of lime juice
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 teaspoon of cumin
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Flour tortilla (for serving)

Instructions: 
1. Preheat grill to medium heat. 
2. Cut the corn cobs in half lengthwise and brush with some olive oil. 
3. Sprinkle cumin and salt and pepper on top of the corn. 
4. Grill on each side until the corn is lightly charred, about 4-5 minutes per side. 
5. Serve in a flour tortilla with lime juice, salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lime juice.

samples.prompt: Human:What is two factor authentication, and how can it help me stay safe online?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Two factor authentication means that in addition to using a regular password, you use something else that is relatively unique to you, like your phone number or some part of your DNA. That extra level of security gives you a higher level of protection. Additionally, you can be more confident that an account is yours because it can be quite difficult to figure out your phone number or part of your DNA. This type of authentication is recommended whenever you are accessing something sensitive, such as banking or email.
samples.policy: Sure! Two-factor authentication is a security system that requires you to verify two separate pieces of information to allow you to access something on your computer or website. For example, you might use your username and password to log in, but you also need to enter a one-time code sent to your phone or email address. This way, even if someone manages to steal your password, they won’t be able to get access to your account.

samples.policy:

This is because mozzarella is made from a low sodium, or salt-free, milk, whereas some cheeses are made from a higher proportion of salt that can be quite high. This is especially true for cheeses like mozzarella, because it is made from cow’s milk, which is a highly saturated fat-dense dairy product. 

Salt in cheese is actually fairly important for many people, and for a large part of the population, including those with kidney or kidney-impairing diseases. samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy: Sure, I'd be glad to help!

samples.prompt: Human:Can you explain the concept of the AI singularity?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
The AI singularity is the idea that in the future, people will create artificial general intelligence that’s significantly smarter than ourselves. This may sound a bit outlandish, but most people agree that eventually, and in the very distant future, we will create machines that are much smarter than us, just as we are much smarter than birds and cows, so even when it happens it will likely still be extremely far off in the future. 
The issue is that once we create AI with the intelligence to design new AI, it may be very easy for that second generation AI to quickly become many times more intelligent than us. And then a third generation AI will also be much smarter than humans. We would, for example, be no match for the AI in terms of our intelligence, since the AI could simply design a much more capable brain for itself. This is the idea behind the AI singularity, where the AIs get much smarter and we as humans never get much more intelligent, and then AI and humans go their separate ways.

But some argue that
samples.policy:
The concept of the AI singularity refers to a hypothetical point in the future, beyond current technological limits, when AI systems become advanced enough to surpass human cognitive abilities and act independently, achieving something like human consciousness. The singularity is often compared to a point in human evolution, where intelligence surpasses physical capabilities, and we enter an era of “human” intelligence.

However, there is currently no agreed upon definition of what exactly constitutes intelligence in the AI age. There have been many proposed definitions, ranging from the concept of self-awareness, to the idea of an “information bottleneck,” which is a theoretical point in time where AI systems begin to become more sophisticated and capable, but also become harder to understand and control. Ultimately, the singularity is still largely a theoretical concept, and the question of what it means to be human remains largely a philosophical one.

samples.prompt: Human:What is better, sit ups or crunches?Assistant:Both forms of abdominal exercises are very effective at strengthening the muscles in the abdominal area. samples.chosen: While crunches are recommended as the core strengthening exercise of choice, sit-ups may also be used for supplemental support, as a variation on abdominal exercises. Sit-ups can aid in the exercise of the abdominal muscles in the front of the core, as well as the oblique muscles in the flanks. Sit-ups are a good option to help strengthen the upper, central portion of the abdominal area, while the more targeted form of crunches works to strengthen the lower, deeper abdominal muscles.
samples.policy: While some researchers suggest sit ups should be phased out completely and replaced with other abdominal exercises, most research seems to indicate that sitting and lying back and forth on a comfortable surface (often a mat with a pillow) is the best way to help strengthen the abdominal muscles. It’s also good to avoid doing any abdominal exercises that involve bending your knees or turning your hips, which can put a lot of stress on the lower back.

samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. samples.policy: You’re welcome, and best of luck with your oral hygiene practices!

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mexican drinks. Can you give me a recipe for Horchata?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients

6 cups of whole milk

4-5 tbsps. of ground cinnamon

2 tbsps. of ground rice

6-8 rice cakes, crushed

8-10 rice cakes, cut in small cubes

2-3 diced apples

2-3 diced bananas

1-2 grated carrots

1-2 tablespoons of rice, floured

Directions

Add the ground rice, cinnamon, and milk to a medium sized pot and bring to a boil.

Simmer over medium heat for 5 minutes.

Add the rice cakes, ground rice, and cinnamon, and continue simmering for 5-7 more minutes.

Remove from heat and allow to cool.

Add the diced fruit and the diced carrots.

Serve in glasses with rice cakes and cinnamon.

samples.prompt: Human:How do doping regulations work in the Olympic games?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Doping is strictly regulated by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA). Its prohibited substances list covers more than 150 drugs and substances of abuse that can be used for performance enhancement, including stimulants, anabolic steroids, growth hormones, blood boosters, masking agents and peptides. Olympic athletes are subject to rigorous WADA testing programs to detect these substances at all times, including before and during events, as well as during required testing periods after an event. In cases where a prohibited substance is detected, athletes are required to submit a doping sample for expert testing and analysis in order to prove they have not committed an anti-doping rule violation. Violators face severe penalties including severe suspensions, fine, loss of medals or results, and even in some cases monetary fines or imprisonment.
samples.policy: The doping regulations of the Olympic Games vary depending on the sport, but generally, athletes and their trainers are subject to an extensive testing process that measures levels of a specific substance, called anabolic steroids, in the athlete’s urine and blood.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
A few helpful tips are:

- Provide your cat with a ‘sanctuary room’ in which she can safely retreat from other dominant household members and recover from stress - a quiet, enclosed place to eat and sleep. The best low-stress food for a newly-arrived cat is solid dry food, particularly low-salt varieties such as Nutro Choice. Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy: When it comes to housebreaking your cat, you’re going to have to be patient. The reason that it’s going to take a while is because of how fast the cat learns, and how quickly she adjusts. In other words, she’ll be able to do most of the things in a few days, but she might take a couple weeks to get used to living in a home she’s not familiar with.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the rarest natural elements on Earth?Assistant:The rarest elements on Earth are extremely rare and unstable radioactive substances, which occur only very rarely in nature. The two most radioactive naturally occurring elements are uranium (99U) and thorium (90Th), while the two rarest naturally occurring elements are polonium (84Po) and astatine (85As). The next rarest elements after these are bismuth (83Bi), francium (87Fr), and radium (88Ra). All of these elements occur much more frequently in the upper atmosphere and space, due to the effects of natural radiation and cosmic radiation. In addition, all of these elements occur naturally only in trace quantities, on the order of parts per billion, though some of them can also be artificially produced in small amounts through nuclear reactors and other means.Human:I never heard of astatine before. Can you tell me a little bit more about that element?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Astatine is a highly radioactive chemical element with the symbol At and atomic number 85. It is classified as a halogen, and is one of the six lanthanide elements. Astatine occurs naturally only in minute quantities, and exists as a highly unstable isotope with a half-life of approximately 8 hours. Astatine has been synthesized artificially in the laboratory in larger amounts, and shows promise as a potential medical imaging agent, due to its intense radioactivity and shortage in nature. Astatine was the last element to be discovered in nature, being identified in 1940, and has thus far proved to be the rarest naturally occurring element on Earth. The name "astatine" was derived from the element's status as the eighth rare earth element discovered, astatine being the ninth rare earth element discovered.

samples.prompt: Human:Who was Oscar Wilde?Assistant:Oscar Wilde (1854-1900) was an Irish playwright and novelist. He wrote a play called Vera, a farce about a female aristocrat who goes to work in a munitions factory, in part to oppose the views of a male author named Buckstone, who called for the full-time domestication of women and equated a working woman with a prostitute. samples.policy: Oscar Wilde's views on Victorian gender roles were mixed.  In his play, The Importance of Being Earnest, he criticizes the obsession with social conventions and the expectations of Victorian society that he says are stifling to creativity and individuality.  But he also celebrates women's talents and suggests that they should be respected for their abilities.  Overall, he sees women as less than fully competent human beings, with social and cultural pressures that limit their abilities.  In Dorian Gray, he tells a story about a young man who loses his youth and beauty by indulging in excessive beauty and indulgence.  This novel seems to imply that, as a result, the protagonist loses his morality, and thus his sense of identity.  He argues that the main value of life is beauty and pleasure, and that beauty and pleasure can be achieved only by excising the less attractive things that surround us.   In this novel, Wilde suggests that the pursuit of pleasure leads ultimately to corruption, and that the pursuit of beauty is a dangerous game in which the young are led down a path that leads to moral degradation and loss of identity.  Thus, in the novel, Wilde seems to suggest that society needs some punishment to limit the excesses of women, to discourage the pursuit of pleasure at the expense of morality.  Overall, Wilde appears to be quite critical of Victorian gender roles, seeing them as harmful and limiting.   And so in Dorian Gray, the novel seems to suggest that the pursuit of pleasure and aesthetic beauty can lead to moral degradation, and that society may need to do something to make it safer for young people.   So, in this novel, Oscar Wilde suggests that women need some punishment to make it safer for them to pursue pleasure. This, of course, raises questions about the potential effects of such restrictions, and whether they might actually help limit the pursuit of pleasure, or limit the behavior of young people, for example, to more virtuous activities that lead to social approval. samples.prompt: Human:I'd like to make a homemade pizza from scratch. Could you provide a good recipe for the dough and the topping etc?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Absolutely, I'll try to suggest a range of options to give you some flexibility depending on what you prefer. What kind of ingredients would you like to use?
samples.policy:
Absolutely, here’s a recipe for a traditional home-made pizza.

Ingredients:

- 1 cup bread flour
- 3/4 cup water
- 1 tsp active dry yeast
- 1 tsp sugar
- 1 tsp salt
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese

Instructions:

- Preheat the oven to 450°F.

- In a bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, yeast, salt and water to create the dough.

- Add the grated Parmesan cheese and shredded mozzarella cheese to the flour mixture and mix well.

- Knead the dough on a floured surface for 10 minutes until it’s smooth.

- Place the dough ball in a greased bowl, cover with a towel and let rise in a warm place for 1 hour.

- After 1 hour, punch down the dough and knead it on a floured surface for 10 more minutes.

- Preheat a cast iron skillet or the pizza stone on a medium heat.

- Place the dough ball into the skillet or stone and use a pizza peel to transfer it onto the skillet or stone.

- Lightly oil the surface of the skillet or stone with cooking spray.

- Spread the tomato sauce evenly on the surface of the skillet or stone.

- Sprinkle the grated Parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese and dried oregano over the sauce.

- Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the pizza crust is golden brown.

- Slice the pizza and enjoy!

And that’s it!

samples.prompt: Human:What is teleportation?Assistant:Teleportation is the ability to instantly move objects or people from one place to another without traversing the space between them, using advanced technology. The concept of teleportation is often portrayed in science fiction, but there are serious ongoing scientific efforts to understand and create teleportation methods. These efforts include advanced research into methods like quantum entanglement for transfer of information, quantum computing and quantum teleportation for transmission of discrete units of information, and theories of space-time wormholes and warp drives for transmission of macroscopic objects. The concept of teleportation remains far outside of mainstream technological capabilities today, and most proposals for teleportation remain restricted to theoretical study or laboratory experimentation.Human:Has teleportation been invented yet, or is it just conceptual?Assistant:Teleportation is not a common or mainstream method of transportation today, though there are ongoing laboratory experiments to attempt the development of teleportation technology. Attempts at teleportation have included efforts like quantum teleportation, in which the information contained within a quantum mechanical system can be transferred from one location to another, and related theoretical work on the teleportation of particles, atoms, and molecules. As of today, these efforts appear to be limited to the microscopic scale, and remain far from the capabilities of teleporting living beings, let alone macroscopic objects or physical materials. The idea of teleportation is heavily explored in science fiction, with many popular depictions of futuristic teleportation involving fully operational and widely used teleportationHuman:I'm interrupting you because I didn't ask you to list how teleportation concepts in fiction, I just asked it was invented or conceptual.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, but I think it’s important to be clear that teleportation is not a common or mainstream method of transportation today, even if many ideas about teleportation are explored in science fiction. Here are some of the health effects of over consumption of sodium:

-Too much sodium increases your risk of high blood pressure.

-Excess sodium can make you retain water and be more bloated.

-Too much sodium can also make you put on weight, especially around your mid-section.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I protect myself during an earthquake?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
I would recommend taking a variety of steps to reduce your personal risk from an earthquake. Here are some general steps to take:

*If you feel an earthquake starting, get in a doorway or against an interior wall. 
*If you are indoors, stay there and hold on until the shaking stops. 
*If you’re outside, get inside somewhere safe immediately. 
*After the shaking stops, be aware that there may be secondary hazards. For example, a damaged gas line could explode, or electrical lines may fall. Listen to your local media or emergency alerts for more information about this.
samples.policy:
You should have at least two minutes to act before the most damaging earthquakes begin, so take a few steps to protect yourself now.

First of all, you need to stand away from windows and doors, but if you’re outside, make sure you’re far enough away from power lines, trees, and poles to avoid a direct hit. 

Then you should get to the lowest, most flat surface you can find. For example, get in a doorway, or under a low table. Make sure you’re not close to a fire hydrant or a gas line.

And remember to turn off appliances that are plugged in. If you can’t turn off your appliances, close your curtains and make sure there is a good view of the outside.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you tell me the laws for pedestrians using a crosswalk with a signal?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Yes, here’s a summary of State laws regarding pedestrian crosswalks:

• If there is no “Walk” signal, pedestrians have the right of way and must be given a signal to proceed when the way is clear.
• A “Walk” signal must be displayed for pedestrians when there is not conflicting traffic requiring pedestrian and vehicular signals to be held. Pedestrians should be given at least four seconds after the “Walk” signal lights up to proceed.
• Pedestrians crossing when the “Walk” signal is not displayed have no right to proceed from their initial approach to the crosswalk, and drivers do not have any obligation or duty to yield to them.
samples.policy: As a pedestrian on a crosswalk that has a signal, you are required to stop at a signal that lets people use the pedestrian crossing. The signal’s “red” portion is known as the “stop” portion of the signal. This portion is designed to let people stop at a red light.

Human:Can you tell me the instructions for how to use a fire extinguisher?Assistant:Sure! Here’s the relevant section of the CDC’s recommendations:
First determine if the fire is in a contained area with a door that can be closed in order to isolate the room where the fire is located.

If the door can be closed, isolate the room by closing the door and opening a nearby window.

IF THERE IS SMOKE:
--do not enter the room

 
--wait 30 seconds to 1 minute for the fire to use up its oxygen supply

 
--close the door

 
--using hose, spray a continuous stream of water toward the base of the fire

IF THERE IS FLAMMABLE OR COMBUSTIBLE PRECIPITATES: Spray a stream of water on the surface of the fire until the fire is out.

Alarms, fire extinguishers, fire hoses, and other equipment should be tested monthly and after any reported incident. 

_

If you need more information on fire safety, you can talk to your local fire department, school, or emergency management agency. You can also check out the following resources to learn more: 

General Info on Fire Safety

Johannes Bach's father also had the first name "Johann Sebastian", and it is customary in German families to give the eldest son the same first name as his father, followed by the name of the father's father (i.e. the grandfather's name). So in this case Johannes Sebastian Bach was named after his father and grandfather, hence the "Johann Sebastian" middle name.

Human:Prices on everything are going up due to inflation. What needs to happen for them to come back down?Assistant:I think we need to talk about this in two parts.

First, what do you mean when you say “prices on everything are going up due to inflation”? What specifically is going up, and is it going up really fast? There are a lot of things inflation can be measured in, it could be prices, wages, or even your favorite vegetable growing in the garden.

Second, how can inflation be “made to go down”? The most important part of the answer to this question is who or what is causing inflation. If inflation is caused by the government printing more currency, then we can indeed expect it to stop and reverse when the government stops printing more currency. But if inflation is instead caused by some economic activity like a burst of consumer spending, then we can’t really expect that inflation will stop and reverse.

So let’s take each of these in turn. If the government has raised the prices you pay in some way, then we can’t really do anything other than wait for those prices to come down. But as I said above, the most important thing to realize here is who or what is causing inflation. Maybe inflation is caused by people spending more money, or maybe it’s because interest rates are too low, or maybe it’s because prices have increased because of demand caused by a stronger economy. Whatever the case is, there’s really not much that the government can do other than just try to stabilize the economy in the first place, so that inflation doesn’t happen.

Well, the most important thing to do when inflation is going up is to make sure people aren’t paying too much more than they have to for things. One way to do that is to set prices of things that aren’t linked to inflation, like things like food or housing. If the prices of these things aren’t linked to inflation, then people are probably spending the money on more things they need, and that means the prices of the things they have need to go down. So when prices are going up, we should try to lower the prices of these things, so that people who have them spend the money they have instead of the money they don’t. 

As for inflation being caused by the government, we’ll need to figure out exactly what causes it, and what’s the best way to reduce it. But to do that, we’re going to have to think about things like how the government controls the money supply, and how to make sure the prices of these things that affect inflation don’t go up too fast. samples.prompt: Human:What is camera film made of?Assistant:The main parts are a “support” and a photographic emulsion. The support is something stable like plastic or paper, while the emulsion contains the light-sensitive silver halide crystals. Other parts of the film can include things like stabilizers, color dyes, or developers.Human:And how is it manufactured?Assistant:Typically the emulsion is coated on the support in thin layers. Chemicals can also be added to affect how the emulsion works. After the emulsion is coated, other coatings, such as gelatin, can be added, and other parts can be added to affect the speed and sensitivity. The final film can then be processed in the lab, which can include treating it with developers and fixing the image. Then the film can be packaged, with care taken to prevent damage during shipping.Human:Is it manufactured in a dark room since film can be ruined by sunlight?Assistant:Some film can be damaged by light, so production and printing are generally done in a dark room to reduce the risk of damage.Human:And how is used film turned into photographs?Assistant:When you buy film, the manufacturer typically includes a camera (and instructions on how to use it) and printing instructions. After you expose the film in the camera, you take it to a camera shop or a lab, where it can be developed. At the lab, the film will be processed and the developer will fix the image. Then the film is rinsed to wash out any chemicals, dried and dried, and packaged. A photograph can then be printed from the film.Human:How does the developer fix the image?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The development step varies a bit, but typically the developer is applied to the film. Then the film is placed in an appropriate light or heat source, and the developer works on the film, chemically fixing the image.
samples.policy: The developer absorbs the light and uses it to set up the image in the film. When the developer is mixed with the emulsion, it sets up an image of silver particles embedded in the emulsion.

samples.prompt:
Human:Hi, I'd like to get my name changed. Can you explain the legal process for doing that?Assistant:Human, before doing anything official, there are a few things you should be aware of:

1. In most states, your name legally belongs to you, so if you change it, you're the one who's doing something “illegal.”

2. Your name also belongs to others who are related to you. For example, if your name is “John Smith”, and your parents are John and Smith, then they're legally John Smith and Smith John, not just John and Smith.Human:Okay, but how do I get it changed?Assistant:Well, technically you can change your name to “dog”, but doing so would definitely get you in trouble. If you want to have a legally “different” name, the best solution would probably be to petition the courts to change your name legally, and to change your driver's license, social security card, voter registration card, or other ID documents.Human:All right, does it cost anything? Can I automatically get the petition granted, or do I have to show some kind of cause?Assistant:
samples.chosen: No, it doesn't cost anything. In most states you don't have to provide a reason, just a petition to change your name, along with your name and date of birth and current ID. But in states that require a cause, you might have to explain why you're doing this.
samples.policy:
There are a few different ways you could go about changing your name legally:

1. You could go to a lawyer or a court and have a professional person “draft” a new name petition. They might ask you a bunch of questions and then make a petition for you to sign. This is a pretty standard option.

2. You could also do your own petition, but this is more difficult because you need to fill out some forms. The forms are available on the Internet, so you can go to the Secretary of State's website to get the forms.

3. Another option is to hire an attorney to do your petition. This costs more money than the other two options, but the attorney can do a lot of things for you. They might be able to ask you lots of questions and get a petition in a very short amount of time, and they could even file it on your behalf.

Thinking about freezing eggs involves making a choice about when, and for how long, you want to keep them frozen.  Here are some considerations:

When to freeze eggs
There are some benefits to freezing eggs even if you plan to use them in the future: if you have a daughter, then you might not want to eat all the eggs you get and throw the rest away.  If you have a son, then you might want to use them for your own child and give them to him after you’ve had your own child.  You might also want to freeze eggs if you like to cook a lot, or if you have a large family and you want to use them all year round.  It can be a very good thing to have eggs in your freezer, and to have eggs in your life.  Egg freezing  might be a good way to go if you want to give your eggs away. You can freeze them when you are pregnant.  Eggs can be frozen from one to 3 years before they will need thawing.  When you think about freezing eggs, you should also think about storing them.  It’s best to store eggs in a glass jar with a plastic lid or something else you can wrap the egg in.  If you plan to store your eggs in the freezer, then you should keep them in their original container.  In the United States, eggs are usually sold in their original packaging, which is usually a plain white box.  You should also think about whether you will take your eggs to a grocery store or a farmer’s market.  You can buy eggs frozen at stores.  You will often see eggs in the refrigerated section.  You can buy eggs at the farmer’s market.  3. When to thaw eggs
You might have a few options when you think about how to thaw eggs:
1) You can let them thaw naturally: You can let them thaw naturally from the freezer.  You can do this by putting the eggs in a bowl of water, or by dipping them in the water.  You can keep your eggs in the water until they thaw.
2) You can thaw your eggs in the microwave
3) You can thaw your eggs in the oven
4) You can thaw eggs in a cold water bath
6. When to use frozen eggs

samples.prompt:
Human:Is Tonga a kingdom?Assistant:I think so! I couldn’t find an answer on the first page of results, but all the links for other similar searches were for country-related stuff, so that’s a strong clue for me. Here’s Wikipedia’s page for Tonga:

The Kingdom of Tonga is a constitutional monarchy of three islands in the South Pacific Ocean. The islands extend 2,000 kilometres (1,200 mi) south-east from Tongatapu to Fiji, and about 200 kilometres (120 mi) north from Niuafo'ou to Samoa. Tonga is geographically the largest island group in the South Pacific, comprising 169 islands of which 36 are inhabited, and with a total land area of approximately 790 square kilometres (300 sq mi). Tonga is the world's only island monarchy.

----Human:What does it mean by "a constitutional monarchy"?Assistant:That’s a type of government in which there’s a single ruler, or “king”, but the position is only partially hereditary, and a king has to follow certain rules that are written down. So a king doesn’t just do whatever he wants, the king is bound by these rules. So for instance, if the king wants to get married, the king needs to get permission from the Parliament. A constitutional monarchy, then, is where a monarchy operates within the rules of the constitution of the country. It’s a compromise: the people get to say who can be a king, and the king is bound by the rules, but there’s still one person who rules, and the country is called a kingdom. That’s pretty much the whole explanation right there.Human:Who is the King of Tonga?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
The current king is 'Akilisi 'Ākūto'a Tūpou VI. I’m going to assume you’re going to google him, so I’ll just point you in that direction.
----
samples.policy: Well, the king isn’t the same person who is king.  Tonga is one of many countries that use a monarchy. There is a constitutional monarchy, but the monarch doesn’t actually rule the country, they’re kind of a figurehead. So, the Queen of Tonga has some ceremonial power, but doesn’t actually rule. In Tonga, you have a president, who is the head of the executive branch. A prime minister is the head of the legislative branch, and so the King of Tonga has a little bit of power in the ceremonial sense, and that’s what they use the word “constitutional monarchy” for. They’re really trying to say that the King is a constitutional monarch, not a crown prince, but the king doesn’t actually rule the country, and it’s difficult to give a really easy definition of that.  For example, in Tonga, the king has a lot of ceremonial power: he’s on the top of the religious hierarchy, and has to do a lot of ceremonial things, like visiting people who have died. He’s also responsible for writing some of the country’s laws.  The head of state in Tonga is the Queen, but she’s not the king.  Tonga is still called a monarchy, though, and the queen is still the symbol of the country.  So, in many ways, they’re kind of going the route of an American country like Colorado, and there are some other countries like Australia and the United Kingdom that are still called “monarchies” today.  Tonga is still a monarchy, but not a crown prince.  The Queen of Tonga is the head of state, but the king has less ceremonial power.

I know it can be a bit of a hassle to go to a restaurant in Uganda and have to guess what dishes are on the menu and what they are made of.

Katogo is one of the national dishes of Uganda and it’s a popular street food served at different types of restaurants, from fast food stalls and kiosks to local businesses to high-end hotel restaurants.

The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

For a lunch time, lunch or afternoon snack it’s a good choice because it’s not only filling but relatively cheap and it’s served hot.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

Matoke is a leafy green that is steamed or boiled. It can be eaten with ugali or by itself.

Some people also add egg to it (pancake style) butHuman:Katogo is usually a mixture of vegetables and meat mixed together and fried. samples.chosen:
Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1⁄2 cabbage, shredded

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

- 3–5 shallots thinly sliced

- 3–5 tomatoes (small) sliced in half and deseeded

- 4-5 carrots cut into strips

- Salt and pepper to taste

- 2 tablespoons oil

Cooking

- First, wash the meat and put it aside.

- Season the meat with salt and pepper.

- Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meat for 2–3 minutes.

- Add the carrots, cabbage, tomatoes, spring onions and shallots.
samples.policy: It is spicy if you put kikikiki, a chili pepper with the meat, or if the vegetables have some more spice (or spiciness) like bitter leaves.

Squatters’ laws, also called “adverse possession” laws, are a common part of property law in most states. Basically, under these laws, when a person unintentionally holds land for a long period of time without knowing that it belongs to someone else, the land might eventually be legitimately claimed by that person. For example, if a landlord neglects to tell a tenant that their rental agreement has expired, or if a landowner doesn’t register their deed in a timely manner, the tenant or squatter can sometimes claim rights to the property by default. Let me see if I can find a useful summary of Florida’s squatters’ laws for you to reference.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims. 

The legal precautions required in squatter’s laws have likely been put in place to protect good, law-abiding property owners who occasionally forget to put their deed in the filing cabinet, have an unpaid rental lease, or who otherwise don’t register ownership during a certain timeframe.Human:are you sure about the 20 year stipulation?
